tool_description: Records structured field observations with location, environmental conditions, and basic sighting data for wildlife tracking studies.

observer_name.description: Name or ID of the observer conducting the field work

observation_datetime.description: Date and time of observation in ISO 8601 format

species_count.description: Number of individual animals observed (1 to 10000)

observation_distance.description: Distance to observed species in meters (1 to 5000)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid datetime format: Use ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Species count out of range: Must be between 1 and 10000.
Invalid observation distance: Must be between 1 and 5000 meters.
Missing required observer identification: observer_name cannot be empty.
usage: Provide observer_name, observation_datetime, GPS coordinates, and species_count. Optionally specify observation_distance and habitat_type to enhance record completeness.

observation_id.description: Unique identifier generated for this observation record

record_status.description: Status indicating successful logging or validation warnings

coordinates_formatted.description: Human-readable coordinate string with decimal degrees
